text: KXRF-LP (100.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Dodge, North Dakota, and broadcasting to Dodge, Halliday, Golden Valley, Twin Buttes, and Zap. The station is owned by The Prairie Center Broadcasting. It airs an inspirational music format. The station was assigned the KXRF-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 26, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * XRF-LP XRF-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in North Dakota Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States Category:Dunn County, North Dakota XRF-LP
title: KXRF-LP
